info.description: Industry-specific business data API. Verified. Affordable.
info.title: IndustryDB API

post.description: Manually trigger a database backup (admin only)

get.description: Get list of all database backups in S3 (admin only)

post.description: Restore database from a specific backup in S3 (admin only, use with extreme caution)

parameters.description: S3 key of backup to restore
parameters.name: body

post.description: Bulk import leads from CSV file (admin only) - max 10k rows per upload

get.description: Get aggregated statistics about users, subscriptions, and exports (admin only)
Get paginated list of users with optional filters (admin only)

parameters.description: Filter by subscription tier (free, starter, pro, business)
parameters.name: tier

parameters.description: Filter by user role (user, admin, superadmin)
parameters.name: role

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific user including subscriptions, exports, and recent audit logs (admin only)

delete.description: Suspend (soft delete) a user account - cannot suspend yourself or superadmins (admin only)

400.description: Cannot suspend own account or superadmin

patch.description: Update user subscription tier, role, email verification status, or usage limit (admin only)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT token
Create a new user account with email and password
Execute multiple operations in a single request with transaction support
Enrich multiple leads with additional data
Create multiple webhooks in a single request
Delete multiple webhooks in a single request
Create a new Stripe checkout session to upgrade/downgrade subscription tier
Create a session to access Stripe customer portal for managing subscriptions, payment methods, and billing history

parameters.description: URL to return to after portal session (validated against whitelist)
parameters.name: return_url

get.description: Get all available subscription tiers with pricing, features, and limits
Get paginated list of all exports created by the current user

post.description: Create a new data export in CSV or Excel format with optional filters

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific export including status and download URL
Download the generated CSV or Excel file for a specific export

404.description: Export not found or file unavailable

get.description: Search leads with filters (industry, location, contact info). Requires authentication.
Get estimated count and statistics for a search without spending credits. Useful for seeing data availability before performing an actual search.
get.summary: Preview search results without charging credits

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific lead. Requires authentication.

post.description: Mark the user's onboarding wizard as completed
Reset the user's onboarding wizard so they can go through it again
Process Stripe webhook events for subscription updates, payment confirmations, and cancellations

get.description: Get all webhooks for the authenticated user
Get a specific webhook by ID

organization_id.description: Optional: If set, subscription applies to organization

ApiKeyAuth.description: API Key for programmatic access (Business tier only)
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
